title: How long can someone look at a smartphone before it gives them mental damage? - Quora

response.answer_text: Looking at a smartphone itself won't do any mental damage to someone. Looking at Twitter, Facebook, Twitch, Snapchat, and Instagram as well as a few other social media apps will give you mental damage. How long you ask, I've seen some people go absolutely nuts after just a few weeks using them doing this year, lol.
Amusing question. I don’t have an amusing answer. I suppose one answer would be: the length of time until you don’t watch where you are going and fall, receiving a head injury.
